Has anyone gotten a password yet?

By Ito Saith Webb on Thursday, June 8, 2006 - 06:46 pm:

Actually I think I was just typing it wrong and the order is the password from Tongue Bool and then the one from Warp, however I think the thing is defective because it does nothing for me except for going blank.
